titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that wages paid to unauthorized aliens may not be deducted from gross income, and for other purposes.
Lawful Worker Tax Deduction Act
Lawful Worker Tax Deduction Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Lawful Worker Tax Deduction Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny a tax deduction for wages paid to or on behalf of an unauthorized alien (defined as an alien not lawfully admitted for permanent residence or authorized to work).
